Python Crash Course

Python

12th Dec,2020

This is going to be one of the awesome Python Crash Course. The Special thing about the course is that you can watch as well as read the course. What I mean by that??? I mean that you can the same course on Youtube in Video format and on our website, you can read it as an article. Is it sound awesome to your ears???

Details of Course

The Course includes most of the topics in python and at the end, we'll build a Project using every concepts that we've learnt so far. The course will also offers you some exercises that you need to complete and have to submit us. Topics Involved in the Course::

1) Print() function
2) List and Tuples
3) Sets and Dictionaries
4) Strings
5) Functions
6) Exceptions
7) Functional Programming - I
8) Functional Programming - II
9) Functional Programming - III
10) File Handling
11) Regex - I
12) Regex - II
13) OOPs - I
14) OOPs - II
15) OOPs - III
16) OOPs - IV
17) Final Project

Hoping you'll enjoy the course and maybe it help you to build your first Project in Programming World.
